label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_028
content:
## 2024-09-09 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 127
- Active: 116
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 50
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 11

### Enrollment By Dose Group
- Low Dose: 31
- Mid Dose: 30
- High Dose: 32
- Placebo: 34

### Immunogenicity By Group
- Low Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 43.8
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 21.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 77.7
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 108.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 15.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 89.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 11.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 16.0
- Mid Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 79.8
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 29.3
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 120.1
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 188.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 138.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 18.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 31.7
- High Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 103.7
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 40.4
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 165.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 261.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 33.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 173.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 46.3
- Placebo
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 12.7
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 4.8
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 20.3
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 28.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 3.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 10.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 2.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 0.8

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 42.3
- Erythema Percentage: 27.5
- Swelling Percentage: 6.6
- Induration Percentage: 11.3
- Mean Pain Duration (Hours): 26.1

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 10.6
- Fatigue Percentage: 36.8
- Myalgia Percentage: 31.4
- Headache Percentage: 20.1
- Chills Percentage: 13.7

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K): Mean: 8.1
- WBC (SD): 1.3
- Lymphocyte Percentage: Mean: 33.4
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 7.5
- Neutrophil Percentage: Mean: 61.2
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 7.8
- Platelets (K): Mean: 230
- Platelets (SD): 41
- CRP (mg/L): Mean: 1.8
- CRP (SD): 1.6
- Hemoglobin (g/dL): Mean: 14.0
- Hemoglobin (SD): 0.8

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-2852, Description: fever, Grade: 2, Relatedness: related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: mid_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-2869, Description: malaise, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-2810, Description: fatigue, Grade: 2, Relatedness: related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: mid_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-2891, Description: arthralgia, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: mid_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-2868, Description: arthralgia, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: low_dose

### Events
- Cold chain temperature log reviewed: all within -70C +/- 5C
- Vaccination day 1: 25 subjects received scheduled dose
- Cold chain temperature log reviewed: all within -70C +/- 5C

### Notes
- Week 28: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 127 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
